, ok Mr. Wise, let's talk NATO. NATO ask all 28 members to contribute 2% of GDP. ONLY 5 nations do so. USA, Greece, England, Estonia and Poland. 23 do not give at least 2%. USA gives 3.91% or 650 billion to the 900.5 billion total budget of NATO. If a failing country like Greece can contribute 2% then why can't France or Germany ( just over 1%) ? It took Donald Trump to say this and now NATO is going to start to enforce the 2%. Why did it take Trump to bring this to the forefront ? You disagree with this and I'll call you """" a moron"""".

Two garbage men pulled me from my car in Georgia after I wrecked early in the morning no one was on the roads. I would have been stuck there if it wasn't for there quick thinking. Too many times people pass others in need. We all should be more thoughful/helpful. Good job guys. Now that's a hero!!

They would be put into GIANT sea pens. Those are nets built right into the water. They can see and hear other orcas. They can be taught to hunt. If they seem like they get it, they could be released, but probably not unless they go with their mothers to their mother's pod. Their dorsal fins will never stand up agian because the smallness and warmth of the pools cause the cartilage in their dorsal fins to break down, resulting in it flopping over, but they can survive that way - just not navigate so well.
Sharks will be feasting!

She needed stomach medicine- onoton 20 boxes per day- after being released unable to hunt properly and I'll Keiko died

No- but weight loss is a journey not a destination. There will be ups and downs. Lose 10 lbs- gain a pound back. Lose 10 more. It's proven that restrictive diets don't work long term and that people who have one cheat day a week lose more weight and stick with a weight loss plan longer than those who go on """"cold-turkey"""" diets. I think addictive substance rehab and weight loss are not comparable in treatment. Think about it- wouldn't you stay super strict on a diet for 6 days if you knew on day 7 you can indulge in one cheat meal? Wouldn't you be more tempted to cheat everyday for 7 days if you knew you will not be allowed a slice of pizza for the next two years?
